Commands.Cure: Slightly restores target's HP twice (second time based on Attack)  Grants 「Medium Attack Up」 for 5 turns
Commands.Swap Turns: Allows an ally to act instantly   Raises self and target's BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 3 turns
Commands.BRV Convert All: Raises party BRV based on current HP  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Siphon Delta: 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  100% HP damage dealt to all enemies  Low Action Delay  Greatly restores all party members' HP based on HP damage dealt, up to 20% of their Max HP  Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds target's Max HP, the excess is converted to BRV  Grants 「Siphon」 for 1 turn  Moderately raises Attack for 5 turns   「Siphon」 nullifies use count consumption

Passives.Cure BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Cure
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Swap Turns BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Swap Turns
Passives.Swap Turns Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Swap Turns
Passives.Cure Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Cure
Passives.Suzaku's Kindness: Upon recovering HP, if the HP recovery amount exceeds Max HP, 50% of the excess is divided amongst alliesHP recovered is limited to 10% of each target's Max HP
Passives.Cure Extend: When using  Cure :- Slightly raises the HP recovery based on Max HP- Slightly raises the HP recovery based on Attack- Raises target's BRV based on Max BRV- The effect of granting  Attack Up  to all party members for 5 turns is changed to granting  Devoted Heart  to self for 10 turns Devoted Heart  has the following effects:- Raises party Attack- Grants party HP Regen
Passives.HP Attack Up All: Slightly raises party Attack when HP is over 50% Max HP
Passives.Swap Turns Extend: When using  Turn Convert :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Slightly improves  Max BRV Up  buff- Extends the duration of  Max BRV Up ,  Speed Up  buffs by 3 turns- Doesn't increase turn count- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action countAfter using  Turn Convert :- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+  for 5 turns   Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.BRV Convert All Extend: When using BRV Convert All :- Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit for 5 turns

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: BRV Convert All  use +1When using BRV Convert All :- Moderately raises the BRV gain based on current HP
Weapons.Rune Dagger CP: 35: When using  Swap Turns :- Raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Lowers Action Delay- Improves  Max BRV Up  and extends its duration- Grants  Small Speed Up  to self and target for 5 turns
Weapons.Caerula Dagger CP: 15: Turns  BRV Attack  to an Ice-elemental magic BRV attack
Weapons.Survival Edge CP: 15: When using  Cure :- Raises HP recovery rate
Weapons.Defender's Dagger CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Siphon Delta
